executable.title: Label Diameter Estimation
executable.description: Estimates the largest diameter of a label, saved as a list of endpoint fiducials in a file.
executable.acknowledgements: This work was supported by funding from Brain Science Foundation.

integer.name: inputLabel
integer.description: The value of the label that should be used for diameter estimation. If set to 0, all non-zero values in the input image will be considered as one label.
integer.label: Label value

image.name: outputDiameters
image.label: Output label image
image.description: Output label image will show the identified diameters

file.name: outputFiducialFile
file.label: File to keep the output fiducials
file.description: File to save the list of fiducials corresponding to the identified diameters
